name: Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company (3M)
description: The Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company, commonly known as 3M, is a diversified technology and manufacturing company with a global presence. Founded in 1902, 3M is headquartered in St. Paul, Minnesota, and operates in more than 70 countries worldwide. The company is renowned for its commitment to innovation, producing a wide range of products across various industries, including healthcare, consumer goods, electronics, and industrial applications. With a robust portfolio of over 60,000 products, 3M leverages science and technology to create solutions that improve lives and support sustainability. Notable products include Post-it Notes, Scotch Tape, and a variety of personal protective equipment (PPE) used in healthcare and industry. 3M is also a leader in adhesive technology and has made significant advancements in the fields of medical devices and environmental solutions. The company's strong focus on research and development drives its ability to address complex challenges and meet the evolving needs of its customers. 3M's mission is to apply science to life, and it continues to foster a culture of innovation that not only enhances its product offerings but also contributes to global sustainability efforts.
